item.description:
Crown Plaza SINGLES DANCE Nashua
Saturday, Feb., 12th.
8:00 PM to 1 am.
Crown Plaza
exit 8 off of rt. 3
Nashua, NH 03061

Proper attire is required. No jeans or sneakers, no work boots

Cover Charge goes from $12 to $15 after 9 pm.

Host: Steve Obermiller. 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net
        Please join Steve O. and about 20 + friends for an evening of dancing and socializing. This is the largest Singles Dances in NH, with between 200 and 300 singles, in a ballroom setting with the most tasteful variety of people and ages you will find anywhere. Because of the popularity of this Dance. Tables and seats will be hard to hold, much past 8:30. Also, if you are late? The Cover Charge goes from $12 to $15 after 9 pm. Please get there as close to 8 pm as possible. So, you can meet some new people as, Steve O. introduces you to everyone at our tables. Ask where Steve O., or Meetup is sitting as you pay at the door. They will show you where we are sitting. Also look for the signs on our tables
, www.togethernh.com/singlesevents.html
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Steve O. or Meetup at the door as you pay.

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Singles Dance Nashua, NH.
